actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-837.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Great Western Trail for potential addition to the National Trails System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the Great Western Scenic Trail, a system of trails to accommodate a variety of travel users in a corridor extending from the Arizona-Mexico border to the Idaho-Montana-Canada border, for study for addition to the national scenic trails system. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to study the appropriateness of motorized trail use along the Great Western Scenic Trail.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Great Western Trail for potential addition to the National Trails System, and for other purposes.
